content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Juan, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I'm glad you're interested in renting it. What rental price are you willing to offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to offer 350 Euros per month for the apartment. Can you confirm if that's acceptable for you?
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your offer, Juan. While I appreciate your willingness to rent the apartment, I'm afraid that 350 Euros per month is not quite what I'm looking for. I would like to negotiate a higher rental price that better reflects the value of the apartment and my needs as a landlord. Is there any room for negotiation on your part?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand that you want a higher rental price. Can you let me know what you are looking for?

I am willing to offer 450 Euros per month for the apartment. Is that acceptable?

Please let me know if you have any other requirements.

Also, I would like to know if you have any references that I can contact to verify my reliability as a tenant.

Thank you.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content:
Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Juan. I appreciate your interest in the apartment and your commitment to being a reliable tenant.

While 450 Euros per month is certainly higher than my initial offer, I'm afraid that it is still not quite what I'm looking for. I would like to negotiate a rental price of at least 500 Euros per month to better reflect the value of the apartment and my needs as a landlord.

As for references, I do require them from all potential tenants to verify their reliability and ability to pay rent on time. I would be happy to provide you with a list of references if you are interested in renting the apartment.

TERMINATE
name: Heinrich Heine
